aka: Miúcha, The Voice of Bossa Nova
this_title: Miúcha, a Voz da Bossa Nova
trans_title: 慕沙：Bossa Nova 第一女声
Miúcha, The Voice of Bossa Nova
introduction: Despite her position at the epicentre of the Brazilian bossa nova scene, singer Heloísa Maria Buarque de Hollanda, known as Miúcha, has been largely underappreciated. This documentary, which dives into her career and personal life through a rich collection of archives, aims to change that.
chinese_title: 慕沙：Bossa Nova 第一女声
foreign_title: Miúcha, a Voz da Bossa Nova
